thread.title: Campus conversation to seek ideas on humanitarian crises and refugees (University of Windsor)
thread.title_full: Campus conversation to seek ideas on humanitarian crises and refugees (University of Windsor) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Campus conversation to seek ideas on humanitarian crises and refugees (University of Windsor)
text: ( Source : University of Windsor ) UWindsor president Alan Wildeman invites students, faculty and staff to a campus town hall conversation on humanitarian crises and refugees Tuesday, October 27 , from 5 to 7 p.m. in Winclare C Room , Vanier
